post.body: It may have been a hack job but it looks great to me, good work :-) #TCOT
awesome work with #TCOT
thanks for the welcome :)
I'm using tweetdeck now and after a few hours it = amazing! Thanks for the tip
loving it so far, now thanks to tweetdeck I will get even less "real work" done :)
It's costing millions to run it so yeah it sort of does need a business model, or a sugar daddy :)
not yet should be coming in 2009
which "them" were you referring too?
I bet it's more comfortable, too bad you didn't bring back any venison for the DAGers :)
blip is teh rockzors :) Won't get internal traffic like YT but perfect for embeding on websites (especially with the pro accnt)
not doing to shabby yourself rockin out at number 8 #TCOT
found you via twitter grader, your tagline Urban Church Marketing got my attention
@icelander ooops didn't clarify :)
I would like to help out with the #TCOT manual action project
yes that would be great
hey is there an easy way to add someone else? or should I just put my own email for each person I add?
thanks will do
I would like to nominate @NathanBenefield @MattBrouillette @penncon @alexcharyna to the #TCOT list, love the new site btw
way to put a positive spin on your follow numbers :)
you know twitter works better when you use it :)
you should run for office in 2010 :)
cool another @MathUSee user on twitter :) nice to meet you
have fun with your celebration
great job with the info button at #tcot
I know thousands of people who are teaching there kids at home :)
Thanks for the link @Pawatercooler have a happy repeal day!
make a group using tweetdeck to follow a select few
I've noticed quite a few new tweeters thanks to #tcot we will see if they stick around
thanks for the link, added you to my PA blogroll, if you ever want to blog about local stuff at Keystone let me know
http://twitpic.com/r13u - oooh purdy
welcome to the twitter
there is one here http://twittgroups.com/group/homeschool or try searching for the term "homeschool"
Hey found you via #tcot and noticed you live in Lilburn, my wife's home town, cool blog btw
found you via #TCOT
and here is a good link with some practice tips http://www.sightm1911.com/lib/review/M637.htm
nice pistol (I carry the same one)
hashtags are a way to follow a meme or topic using twitter search, http://tinyurl.com/5p66ve #tcot
#TCOT is the hashtag for Top Conservatives on Twitter, check out http://topconservativesontwitter.org for more info
thanks, with #TCOT it's taken off a little quicker than I thought it would
your links aren't coming through as valid, just thought you should know
thanks for the shout out about http://keystoneconservative.com/
sleep tight
It appears you're back on the list #tcot
that's strange #tcot
yeah I was ranked higher on the list when I had half the followers :) #tcot
just goes to show that you find the strangest people on twitter :) How Colorado treating you?
greetings fellow conservative and Disc golfer :)
you should check out @Mathusee :)
@scobleizer with tweetdeck and other grouping tools you can follow a plethora of people and use groups to follow your favorites
Well you are from Ohio so you should like Potato soup :)
Thanks for the love :) We'll get Murtha out of here one of these days
that's not flying, that's falling... with STYLE! :) http://tinyurl.com/ayaoy2
To all my new twitter friends I'm also on facebook if you would like to friend me there as well http://bit.ly/49Uq
RT @larrymwalkerjr: THE CONSERVATIVE ACTIVIST'S GIANT E-MAIL LINKS PAGE! http://tinyurl.com/6aovhv
hit 500 followers today, welcome tweeple!
RT @ericjodom: Top 10 List of People to Unfollow on Twitter http://tinyurl.com/5proac
mmmm leftover shrimp alfredo for lunch
RT @ericjodom: Need some votes in my new Politics4all poll http://tinyurl.com/58ptu6 #dontgo #rebuild
switched to tweetdeck to handle all the new people I follow
listening to and talking with the guys at http://tinyurl.com/6r689f
good overview of how to use DIGG well, conservatives take note http://is.gd/a3m3
a good message to the movement, FIX IT! find what else needs to be fixed and FIX IT! http://is.gd/a3kT
My first video blog , happy end of prohibition day http://bit.ly/yTyt
RT @MaximusPolitics: Call Rush Limbaugh about #TCOT today. Call in at 1-800-282-2882
Go Tweet for Chuck http://bit.ly/cHkH #TCOT (please retweet)
RT @danzarrella: What's in a Retweet? The Data Behind Viral Messaging on Twitter http://tinyurl.com/5j4rww (please retweet?)
Filming my dad/boss teaching calculus
watch @FredThompson talk about the economy on YouTube http://bit.ly/6nwA
I just emailed my state chair and asked him to join twitter. Why not email yours?!? http://rncchairtechindex.blogspot.com/ #TCOT
Will PA Dems run hardball's Chris Matthews against Specter? Good blog post here, http://bit.ly/16rSg
made the background smaller should work on 1280 displays but not on 1024, oh well
cool #tcot is a trending topic http://tinyurl.com/5p66ve
Celebrating the repeal of prohibition with some spring house http://www.springhousebeer.com/
back from a local micro brew stocked up for our party this evening
and by go back I meant "got back" :)
Just go back from doing some promo filming for a client
Just blogged about Philly cops and their guns http://tinyurl.com/phillyguns
chilling with my wife and catching up on Chuck and Heroes while enjoying a Leinekrugles Sunset Wheat
w00t! hit the 1k followers mark thanks mostly to #tcot I'm also on facebook if you're interested http://bit.ly/49Uq
well hello there mr. fail whale haven't seen you in a little while
man a lot of good content on twitter today, hence all the retweets
RT @SarahFowler: Should your company be worried about your personal brand? http://bit.ly/pMgu
RT @PatrickRuffini: RT my Case Against Twitter post since it was late last nite: http://twurl.nl/18vap6 #TCOT
RT @techRepublican: Exclusive UStream Interview: Saul Anuzis, candidate for RNC Chair http://snipurl.com/7p7yt #TCOT #rncchair
RT @KeystoneNews: New post: "PA elected officials and email newsletters" http://is.gd/aRaR #KCON #TCOT
RT @DavidAll: Check out the @SAnuzis @TechRepublican ustream Video: http://www.ustream.tv/recorded/931513 #TCOT
The Sierra Mist re-gifting videos make me laugh http://www.facebook.com/sierramist
check out the PNC bank quiz, "Economics Trivia" http://tinyurl.com/5wewvt
long day, business meeting at outback :) BWI and back home
RT @dpillie: thinks he's been kicked off of the #tcot list...
Checking out my TweetStats! http://tweetstats.com/graphs/ethand
Go ravens! http://twitpic.com/sx0d
A perfect combination for planning and brainstorming :) http://twitpic.com/svp8
Great post: RT @sorendayton: Blog: Recession and failure reshaping the conservative movement: Financial services http://tinyurl.com/6mmbqo
going to go hang out with @wcoder this afternoon and talk politics
had a fun Christmas party with my wife and all her music students
w00t! facebook now does HD and let's me embed anywhere, (yeah late learning that bit of news but still excited) http://bit.ly/fI4a
Way to busy lately looking forward to a nice vacation in Florida, not bringing the laptop going to read and hang out with family.
Any Ohio tweets covering this story from the Buckey Institute? http://www.buckeyeinstitute.org/article/1284 Scary stuff #tcot
A long day and gearing up for a longer one tomorrow
busy busy today, photographing books and DVD's editing video and working on a website
A good bit of snow here in Lancaster, PA heading out soon for anniversery dinner with my wife 2 years w00t! :)
Want to go to Davos? Upload your opinionated video and you could win a free trip http://www.youtube.com/davos
oh my word I need this iwork app for my iPhone #macworld I've been wanting this for a while
the theme of #macworld is we can make your crappy photos/video/presentations look good
w00t! more facebook integration with iPhoto #macworld
ooooh faces sounds cool in iPhoto #macworld a ton of other applications for this

RT @JonHenke: Obama's clever fiscal stimulus strategy. http://tinyurl.com/78kct4
good morning and welcome new followers ooh and check out the new macbook wheel http://bit.ly/IjGj
dinner with my wife, I've been smelling that potato soup cooking all day mmmm tasty :)
firefox crashed when I was 90% done uploading a 600 mb movie la la la
found a bunch of cool new tweeps to follow
RT @sanuzis: I am giving Grover lessons on vlingo
RT @ericjodom: Major props go out to Grover and ATR. Good job on the debate. #rncdebate #rncchair
#rncdebate winner is @steele4chair followed by @anuzis and @kenblackwell
